extendedInfo.description: #1 Free Game in so many hearts and counting!!From birth a sperm is raised to 'just keep swimming', it is with thismotto that no matter the place, no matter the circumstance, no matterthe outcome, you can guarantee one thing: that sperm will keepswimming!Control your sperm as you make your way through several unlockablelevels, and endless fun. Don't hit the walls and dodge objects! LikeThe Helicopter game you loved on your computer, but better--withsperm!Just press the screen to go up and let go to go down. Simple and Easy!FEATURES:-Three different levels of difficulty:1. V-Wall: Navigate your way through conception: bounding forward, upand down, toward the ever elusive destination.2. Pool: Somehow you've managed to find yourself in a pool's cleaningsystem. Never fear, the sperm's motto persists even in thesecircumstances. Just keep swimming--but be sure to watch out forchlorine, they may look like a distant relative, but these killersaren't looking for hugs! (Purchasable)3. Poop: Flush! You're in the potty, touching this clogged drainswalls will surely kill you, don't forget to dodge the floaterstoo!(Purchasable)-Two modes of difficulty to test your skills: Newbie and Stud-Awesome funky fresh soundtracks to inspire and set the mood for theseamen swim.-High score tracker-Leaderboards, compare your score with friends and the world!-Achievements-In-game Pause-Multiple colors of sperm, including Rainbow sperm--sperm never lookedso cool, watch as it multi-tasks; swimming and changing colors!(Purchasable)-Share with friends by posting on FACEBOOK or TWITTER
